lexUnit.name: tobacco.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a preparation of the dried and fermented nicotine-rich leaves of an American plant, used for smoking or chewing

sentence.text: He took a seat in solemn silence and , uninvited , started to roll up some of the Keraing 's tobacco .
The little room smelled of his pipe tobacco , eau de Cologne , shit .
